Dice Rolling Game.des: Create a game where people gamble tokens on the roll of two six sided dice.

Find Pi to the nth digit.des: Create a simple long division calculator to solve for Pi to the nth digit

Fibonacci Sequence.des: Create a program that finds Fibonacci's Sequence to the nth digit

Binary Conversion.des: Create a program that converts a number to binary, without using any inbuilt functions. (Hint: look into modulus operator)

Piglatin Translator.des: Reatecay away rogrampay hattay onvertscay away iecepay ofway exttay otay igpay atinlay, andway ackbay

Distance Between Two Cities.des: Create a program that uses a geolocation API to find the distance between two points on a map

Create a SMTP Server.des: Create a program that uses STMP to send email from a program

Online Cloud Storage.des: Create a REST api that recieves and sends files

Document Database.des: Create a simple program that runs a simple document based database. See @sojs_coder/sodb on npm

Flappy Bird.des: Create a simple flappy bird game using any library you want. Look into HTML canvas and construct 3

Factorial Calculator.des: Create a calculator the solves for the factorial of a number that the user chooses

Simple Adventure Game.des: Use your knowledge of classes and objects to create an adventure game with multiple rooms

Ideas Website.des: Create a simple website that generates ideas with the click of a button

Merge Sort.des: Create a merge sort algorithm from scratch

Chat room.des: Create a simple chat room using websockets where users can chat

Stocks Widget.des: Use an API such as IEX Cloud to get real time updates on stock prices, and display them in embeddable widgets

ChatGPT Implementation.des: Use the DaVinci model from OpenAI to create an AI assistant chatbot

Cookie Clicker.des: Create a simple cookie clicker game. Look it up if you don't know.

Mad Libs.des: Allow the user to input verbs and adjectives to create a final story

ASCII Art.des: Create a simple ASCII art drawing of anything you want, and print it.

Multiplayer 2D Shooter.des: Create a 2D shooter with inventories, different guns, a chat, and skins

Online Drawing App.des: Create an online drawing app using HTML canvas where people can save, post, and comment on each others posts.

Portfolio Webiste.des: If you have not yet made one, make a website where you put all of your work on. If you have already made one, update it. You know you need to.

Calculator.des: Create a basic calculator that can perform addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division

Tic-Tac-Toe.des: Create a game of Tic-Tac-Toe where two players can play against each other

Guess the Number.des: Create a game where the computer randomly generates a number and the user has to guess what it is

To-Do List.des: Create a simple to-do list application that allows users to add, edit, and delete tasks

Hangman.des: Create a game of hangman where the user has to guess a word chosen by the computer

Rock-Paper-Scissors.des: Create a game of rock-paper-scissors where the user can play against the computer

BMI Calculator.des: Create a program that calculates a person's body mass index (BMI) based on their height and weight

Quote Generator.des: Create a program that generates random quotes from famous people or literature

Weather App.des: Create a program that retrieves the current weather for a given location and displays it to the user

Pomodoro Timer.des: Create a program that implements the Pomodoro Technique, a time management method that uses a timer to break down work into intervals

Budget Tracker.des: Create a program that helps users track their income and expenses, and manage their budget

Maze Generator.des: Create a program that generates a random maze and allows the user to navigate through it

Music Player.des: Create a program that plays music files and allows the user to control playback (e.g. play, pause, skip, etc.)

Image Viewer.des: Create a program that displays images and allows the user to navigate through them

Chatbot.des: Create a program that simulates a conversation with a human, using natural language processing and machine learning

Game of life.des: Create a simulation of the Game of Life, a cellular automaton devised by the British mathematician John Horton Conway in 1970

Port scanner.des: Create a programthat scans a network for open ports, useful for security and network troubleshooting

File Encryption.des: Create a program that encrypts and decrypts files using a user-provided password

Neural Network.des: Create a program that implements a simple neural network, using machine learning algorithms

Virtual Machine.des: Create a program that simulates a virtual machine, allowing users to run different operating systems and software on a single physical machine

Address Book.des: Create a program that allows users to store and manage contact information

Text Editor.des: Create a program that allows users to create and edit text documents

Currency Converter.des: Create a program that converts between different currencies

Recipe Database.des: Create a program that allows users to search and save recipes

Language Translator.des: Create a program that translates text between different languages

Code Review.des: Create a program that allows users to review and collaborate on code projects

Code Optimizer.des: Create a program that analyzes and optimizes code for performance and efficiency

GPA Calculator.des: Create a program that calculates a student's grade point average (GPA) based on their grades

Sudoku.des: Create a program that allows users to play the popular logic-based number-placement puzzle

Expense Tracker.des: Create a program that allows users to track their expenses and create a budget

RSS Reader.des: Create a program that retrieves and displays news articles from RSS feeds

Alarm Clock.des: Create a program that allows users to set alarms and reminders

Password Manager.des: Create a program that securely stores and retrieves user passwords

Mind Mapping.des: Create a program that allows users to create visual diagrams to organize their thoughts and ideas

Astronomy.des: Create a program that allows users to view information about planets, stars and other celestial bodies

Stopwatch.des: Create a program that allows users to measure the time for an event or activity

Virtual Pet.des: Create a program that simulates a virtual pet, allowing users to interact and take care of it

Job Board.des: Create a program that allows users to search, view and apply for job opening

Appointment Scheduler.des: Create a program that allows users to schedule appointments and view their schedule

Virtual wardrobe.des: Create a program that allows users to keep track of their clothing and create outfits
